snippet: Maria Semple’s razor-sharp sendup of privileged Seattle is a novel about a fish-out-of-water mother, her Microsoft-star husband, their bright daughter and a back story shrouded in mystery.
abstract: Janet Maslin reviews book Where'd You Go, Bernadette by Maria Semple.
lead_paragraph: Maria Semple’s razor-sharp sendup of privileged Seattle is a novel about a fish-out-of-water mother, her Microsoft-star husband, their bright daughter and a back story shrouded in mystery.

headline.seo: ‘Where’d You Go, Bernadette,’ a Maria Semple Novel
